TEXT: Directly activate your orbs abilities, care not for maximum orb slots with the ${ModID}:Manifest ability creating more as you Channel.
#yBayonetta series originally created by #yPlatinum #yGames for card names and thematic inspiration.
Witchcraft is equal parts magic and fashion.
In addition to paying its cost, a Wicked card also requires that you have a number of orbs equal to its Wicked Counters, which will be evoked when the card is played
